Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed near Cicero
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing near Cicero due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing near Cicero due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
